title: OpenShift deployment fails over HTTP POST request to service monitor URL
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm unable to deploy application to OpenShift. I've tried to revert https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/37709 which made no difference.

### Expected behavior

Deployment works fine, as does with Quarkus 3.6.3.

### Actual behavior

Deployment fails with following error:

```
[2023-12-19T10:56:01.449Z] 10:56:01,288 INFO  mvn: [ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:999-SNAPSHOT:build (build) on project many-extensions: Failed to build quarkus application: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
[2023-12-19T10:56:01.449Z] 10:56:01,288 INFO  mvn: [ERROR] 	[error]: Build step io.quarkus.kubernetes.deployment.KubernetesDeployer#deploy threw an exception: io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClientException: Failure executing: POST at: https://reducted:6443/apis/monitoring.coreos.com/v1/servicemonitors. Message: Not Found.
```

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. `git clone git@github.com:quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite.git`
3. `cd quarkus-test-suite/super-size/many-extensions`
4. `git revert 03fd09d60ebd693ce122d21d9b5d584883caed33`
5. `mvn clean verify -Dopenshift -Dit.test=OpenShiftUsingExtensionManyExtensionsIT`


Also following tests are failing:

```
io.quarkus.ts.many.extensions.OpenShiftUsingExtensionDockerBuildStrategyManyExtensionsIT
io.quarkus.ts.many.extensions.ServerlessExtensionDockerBuildStrategyOpenShiftManyExtensionsIT
io.quarkus.ts.many.extensions.ServerlessExtensionOpenShiftManyExtensionsIT
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Fedora 38

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "21.0.1" 2023-10-17 LTS

### Quarkus version or git rev

999-SNAPSHOT

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.9.3

### Additional information

OpenShift 4.14 and 4.11.

```
apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
kind: ServiceMonitor
metadata:
  annotations:
    app.openshift.io/vcs-uri: <<unknown>>
    app.quarkus.io/commit-id: 1f08d0d4c800bd032d284a8e20bd69737ae8c154
    app.quarkus.io/vcs-uri: git@github.com:quarkus-qe/quarkus-test-suite.git
    app.quarkus.io/build-timestamp: 2023-12-19 - 23:21:02 +0000
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: app
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
    scenarioId: OpenShiftUsingExtensionManyExtensionsIT-1703028032464
    tsLogWatch: app
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: quarkus
    app.openshift.io/runtime: quarkus
  name: app
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: app
      app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  endpoints:
    - scheme: http
      targetPort: 8080
      path: /api/q/metrics
      interval: 10s
      honorLabels: true
```
